content: section 6 using color c pick up stitches purl wise along side of section 2 r1 sl1 k8 k2tog tbl r2 sl1 p8 p2tog you will be joining sections 1 2 &5 repeat row 1 and 2 ending in a purl row until you have joined the 3 sections together 20 row finish stuff with batting and bind off with a kitchner graft or your favorite bind off pattern & images © 2010 by audrey bochantin contact apatterns@gmail com
